channel.title: &* andsplat, a blog by Ben W. Fey
channel.description: Recent content on &* andsplat, a blog by Ben W. Fey

item.title: Photo Essay: Snowy Walk in the Neighborhood
The Lost Show: A Virtual Photography Show
item.description: Note: Originally this was a series of blog posts that I posted 1-10 April 2020. I have edited the original series into the following single post.

item.title: A roll of film with the Hasselblad 500cm
Braun, Apple, Lamy
item.description: The other day at work I was using my Apple AirPods and noticed that they looked nice beside my Lamy Safari fountain pen.

item.title: I decided to make my own custom notebook
item.description: I have a lot of hobbies/interests (fountain pens, photography, making things, etc.) and a lot of these interests came together for my last project: making a custom notebook.

item.title: Nikon F3
item.description: I dusted off the light box and film scanner today. I really enjoy film photography and it was fun to take a new look at photos that I took last summer with my Nikon F3.

item.title: He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named
item.description: I know I’m probably not using this iOS feature as intended, but I’m OK with that.

item.title: The Architect Nib (and how I still have a blog)
First Anniversary!
item.description: I normally don’t write about such personal things, but as I look back on the past year, there is so much to be thankful for that I wanted to share at least a few thoughts.

item.title: About
item.description: andsplat, a blog by Ben W.
